text: Allegra Rose Edwards is an American television actress known for playing Cindy McCabe in the USA Network anthology series Briarpatch and Ingrid Kannerman in the Prime Video comedy Upload. ==Early life== Edwards is originally from Denver, Colorado. She began modeling when she was 18 months old and continued to model, dance, and act throughout her childhood. ==Career== Edwards studied theatre and television at Pepperdine University in Malibu. During her time at Pepperdine, Allegra wrote scenes for Pepperdine’s annual Songfest, performed with Pepperdine’s Improv Troupe, and appeared in Tutor, a 2009 comedy short written and directed by Jeff Loveness. After graduating from Pepperdine with her bachelor's degree in 2010, Edwards moved to San Francisco to attend the American Conservatory Theater's three-year Master of Fine Arts program, which she completed in 2013. After earning her MFA, Allegra spent time in Los Angeles and New York City. In 2015, she performed in an off-Broadway production of "Everything You Touch." In 2019, Edwards played Cindy McCabe in the USA Network anthology series Briarpatch. She starred as Ingrid Kannerman in the Prime Video comedy Upload in 2020, and will continue in the role for the upcoming second season. Edwards has also appeared in episodes of Modern Family, New Girl, Friends from College, The Mindy Project, and Orange Is the New Black. ==Personal life== Edwards lives in New York City. She has been engaged to actor Clayton Snyder since Thanksgiving 2019.
